bibl.title: Posidippus' Shipwrecks. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The recently discovered literary papyrus P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309 (= M.-P.3 1435.01; LDAB 3852) reveals that, in ancient times, epitaphs for those drowned at sea formed an independent epigrammatic category and not a mere subgenre of funerary epigram as we have hitherto been used to think.
bibl.seg: DI NINO Margherita Maria, Posidippus' Shipwrecks. Avec résumé en anglais.

The recently discovered literary papyrus P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309 (= M.-P.3 1435.01; LDAB 3852) reveals that, in ancient times, epitaphs for those drowned at sea formed an independent epigrammatic category and not a mere subgenre of funerary epigram as we have hitherto been used to think.
